oauth.description:
Access to SUPLA MQTT requires authorization in SUPLA Cloud.

 ###### ![AIS logo](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_supla_mqtt/mqtt_broker_ais_supla.png?v=2) 

 Click the **SUBMIT** below to start the authorization process
oauth.title: Authentication the access in SUPLA Cloud

abort.single_instance_allowed:
You already have the integration to SUPLA MQTT set up.

 If you want to reconfigure, remove the current integration first.
